gf_histogram(~price, data = diamonds) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 1A: Diamond Prices",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
gf_histogram(~price,
  data = diamonds,
  bins = 100
) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 1B: Diamond Prices",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
diamonds %>%
  gf_histogram(~carat) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 2A: Carats of Diamonds",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
diamonds %>%
  gf_histogram(~carat,bins=100) %>%
  gf_labs(
    title = "Plot 2A: Carats of Diamonds",
    caption = "ggformula"
  )
